Carpool App Logo Clever Carpool Log In Log Out Driver Passenger Rate Us About Passenger Registration Driver Registration Register Next Email Password Retype Password Enter Full Name Note: You must be aged 18 or over to use this app. Date Of Birth Your date of birth is: Home Address First Name Surname Gender Enter Here Please enter your name and gender below. Please enter your date of birth below. Please enter your Irish car registration below and then click the button for validation purposes. Note that this car will be your vehicle for providing carpooling and you must only use this vehicle. Day Month Year Car Registration Are your registering as a Passenger
or as a Driver? Click the button below to retrieve car details. Analyse Please take a clear picture of your license. Driver License 1. Please make sure your license is up-to-date and valid for use as a full driving license in the Republic of Ireland. Note that you are not allowed to drive on a learner permit. 2. If the picture is blurry, the card may not be analysed. In this case, take another picture. 3. If you do not have a valid license, you must register as a passenger only.
Car Type:	 Year of Make:	 Car Color:	 Engine CC:	 Fuel Type:	 Car Body:	 If below describes your car then click next, otherwise
click try again and reenter your registration.

and mobile number below. Try Again?> Please enter your email and a valid password. Email Please enter your email and a valid password. Passwords must be at least 8 characters long and
contain at least one capital letter and one number from (0–9). Complete

using the phone camera Become a driver HomeNavigationActivity Home Carpool Dashboard Notifications Dashboard Home Profile Navigation Bar Open Add a Post Navigation Bar Closed Watch this space! About Us Home Dashboard Search for an address.. Forum Trips This application is being developed as part of a final year project in Computer Applications at Dublin City University. The two developers are Shaun Carey and Nigel Guven. Clever Carpooling is an application to be used by students and commuters to fill up available space in cars, thereby reducing traffic and contributing to a greener community. Git Repo: Clever Carpooling Requires DCU School of Computing Credentials. Link to project code can be found below. If you would like to log out please click the button below. Active Users: Active Posts: Satellite 1. Please select your starting point for the journey by tapping the map where your journey will begin. 2. Now select where your destination is by tapping the map. 3. Now click the 'GO' button on the right. Go Please enter the date and time of your departure. Date and Time Create Route Date: Time: User: Email: Mobile: This person is offering a lift. This person is looking for a lift. This is your post. You are out of the way. You own this post. You may only view its details. Origin: Destination: Distance: Route Duration: Date of Departure: Time of Departure: If your route is correct, please click the button below.
